name: emotionawareide
description: Predicts user mood and gives tips based on input from some equipment

emotionawareide.server.port.description: The port used for receiving data.

emotionawareide.e4.port.description: The port used for transmission of E4 data.

emotionawareide.eye.port.description: The port used for transmission of Eyetracker data.

emotionawareide.action.survey.activate.description: Poll the user for mood, this data will be used to train the AI.

emotionawareide.action.survey.time.description: How often should the survey be polled. (minutes)

emotionawareide.action.estimate.activate.description: Estimates the users mood during the session.

emotionawareide.action.takeBreak.time.description: The amount of time, being in a certain mood, before the IDE tells you to take a break. (minutes)
